title: China Slams 'Arrogant' Trudeau as Huawei Battle Heats Up
content:
1. China Slams 'Arrogant' Trudeau as Huawei Battle Heats Up  Bloomberg
  2. China sentences Canadian businessman Michael Spavor to 11 years for spying  South China Morning Post
  3. Huawei CFO fights extradition as Beijing raises pressure  Aljazeera.com
  4. Tainted justice? Jailing of a Canadian ‘spy’ in China is a result of US desire to drive a wedge between Ottawa and Beijing  RT
  5. EDITORIAL: Spavor’s verdict is unacceptable, unjust  Toronto Sun
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
